title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 1, pt. 403 - Program Requirements for Social Services
content:

Notes

Amended

New

York State Register June 3, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 22, eff. 6/3/2020

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§ 20[3][d], 34[3][f], 358, 390, 410, 410-x; art. 5, title 9-B; L. 1997, ch. 436; L. 2005, ch. 57, part C
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
